H0.text: Which London underground line provides a regular service to all Heathrow terminals. Bakerloo

H1.text: Which London underground line provides a regular service to all Heathrow terminals. Central

H2.text: Which London underground line provides a regular service to all Heathrow terminals. Circle

H3.text: Which London underground line provides a regular service to all Heathrow terminals. Picadilly

A4.text: The Piccadilly line has been extended to serve Heathrow Terminals 2, 3, 4, and 5.

A5.text: Extensions to the Piccadilly line in 1986 and 2008 added service to Heathrow Terminal 4 and Terminal 5, respectively.
